title: HOW TO HOLD ON TO MEGA GNAR LONGER ?
body: When we use {{champion:150}} , most of us what it to quickly turn to MEga Gnar but it dosen't lasts very long.

replies.body:
Can you grammar?
Actually instead of just bagging you let me help.
1) Don't write the question in the title.
2) PLS don't write everything in capitals in the title, it makes you look desperate and people are more likely to skip your post.
3) Don't rush, give yourself at least 5 minutes to structure your question/post because right now I'm confused as to exactly what you want and the guy below me might have missed your question.
4) Be patient, there are like 20 or so regular board members that hang around oce so it may take a few hours for someone to get back to you. If they do be prepared for constructive criticism.
5) Give details, then we have something to work with and can break down our answer that tailors to what you are asking for

You need to change your title (if what I'm thinking of is correct?) to. "How do we hold onto Mega Gnar for longer?" Question is you don't.
But if you play Gnar like I do hold your rage bar around 90% so when you need it for real it's almost available. (In my opinion it's the best way to play Gnar especially if you have {{summoner:12}}  and need to go bot for dragon or team fight)
